member.name: T:RstLinkRevitClient.RSLinkImport
member.summary: Import incremental changes from the RstLink intermediate XML file

member.name: M:RstLinkRevitClient.RSLinkImport.GetFamilySymbol_2008(Autodesk.Revit.Document,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Return a FamilySymbol for a given category name and type. (in theory, we can have non-unique solution, i.e. the same type name for more than one family from this category!)

member.name: M:RstLinkRevitClient.RSLinkImport.GetFamilySymbol(Autodesk.Revit.Application,Autodesk.Revit.BuiltInCategory,System.String)
member.summary: Helper to get specified type for a given category. Return a FamilySymbol for a given category name and type. (in theory, we can have non-unique solution, i.e. the same type name for more than one family from this category!)

member.name: T:RstLinkRevitClient.RSLinkExport
member.summary: Export all structural elements to the RstLink intermediate file. Currently, only columns and framing is implemented - skeleton code is in place for others.
